cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 17th Nov 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 17th Nov 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: Capsule bed has its own door that can be opened by access card. Each of Capsule bed is a single bed, it fits with hotel room essentials such as reading lights, mirror, wall lights, USB charging ports, fan ventilation and laptop desk.Mattress Size 100cm*20

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Double capsule bed has its own door that can be opened by access card. Each of Capsule bed is a Double bed, it fits with hotel room essentials such as reading lights, mirror, wall lights, USB charging ports, fan ventilation and laptop desk.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
